thread.title: Salman Khan Gets Robbed by 4 Girls in a Nightclub
thread.title_full: Salman Khan Gets Robbed by 4 Girls in a Nightclub

title: Salman Khan Gets Robbed by 4 Girls in a Nightclub
text:
Photos Actor Salman Khan | PTI photo 
KARACHI: Salman Khan might have save many damsels in distress in multiple films, but the actor couldn’t protect himself from getting robbed. 
According to a source, the incident took place at a nightclub in Mumbai, where four female fans came to chat with the 49-year-old actor and went away with his wallet, sunglasses and ‘Bajrangi Bhaijaan’ pendant that were kept on a nearby table, reports the Express tribune. 
The insider further added that the ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ star was advised by his security to file a complaint, but he refused and improved his security instead. 
Though Arpita Khan Sharma denied the news by saying that the actor has not visited a night club in recent times, producer Nandita Singga confirmed the incident by saying that Salman was robbed and had to increase his security from two men to 14.
